intro: Pollalesta colombiana, commonly known as the Colombian pollalesta, is a flowering plant native to the Andean regions of Colombia. It belongs to the family Rubiaceae, which includes many species of shrubs and trees. The plant is characterized by its small, clustered flowers that are typically white or pale yellow in color. Its leaves are opposite and oval-shaped, with a smooth texture. Pollalesta colombiana is often found in moist, shaded habitats within cloud forests.
